devDependenciesComments.babel-core: this is the core babel api for transformation of es6 to es5
devDependenciesComments.babel-cli: this is to use babel cli to compile JSX
devDependenciesComments.babel-preset-react: this is to compile JSX to react.createElement
devDependenciesComments.deep-freeze: to freeze objects while testing redux reducers
devDependenciesComments.mocha: to run tests using describe and it functions
devDependenciesComments.webpack: to use webpack for bundling all the files and assets and other goodies
devDependenciesComments.webpack-dev-server: refreshes content automatically in the browser while you develop your application. hot reloading of react app for fast development
